'''Ableism''' is a term used to describe [[discrimination]] against people with [[disability|disabilities]] in favor of people who are able-bodied.
==Organisations working against ableism== * [[American Association of People with Disabilities]] [http://www.aapd-dc.org/] * [[Alliance for Technology Access]] [http://www.ataccess.org/] * [[Center for Disability Law and Policy]] [http://www.equalemployment.org/aguideto.htm] * [[Ragged Edge Online]] [http://www.raggededgemagazine.com/1100/1100votestory.htm]
